title: Executive Order 6699-Changes in Boundaries of Internal Revenue Collection Districts, Illinois
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by section 12 of title 26 of the United States Code, it is ordered that the counties of Henderson, Knox, Peoria, and Warren, at present included in the first internal revenue collection district of Illinois, be, and they are hereby, transferred to and made a part of the eighth internal revenue collection district of Illinois.
This order shall become effective July 1, 1934.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6699-Changes in Boundaries of Internal Revenue Collection Districts, Illinois Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362472
